Health: 8+4 per â…ƒ

After level 5: +D6 damage

After level 10: +D8 damage, +10 Combat Skill

actions.name: Chain Lash (Physical)
actions.description: The Abyssal Vexator extends its ethereal chains and makes a deadly attack against a target. On a hit, the target takes D6 Piercing damage and must succeed on an Athletics check or be knocked Prone.

actions.name: Tormenting Bind
actions.description: The Abyssal Vexator targets a creature it can see and attempts to wrap its chains around the creature's body. The target must succeed on a Dodge check or be Restrained by the chains. At the start of the target's turn, it takes D4 Necrotic damage as the chains constrict and torment it. The Abyssal Vexator doesn't act against a character while they are affected by this Action; it will either change target or simply wait for the character to die or free themselves.

actions.name: Abyssal Wither (Magical)
actions.description: The Abyssal Vexator focuses its power on a target, who must succeed on an Endurance check or have its vitality drained away. On a failed check, the target takes D10 Necrotic damage and its maximum Health is reduced by the amount of damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a Camp Rest.

system.description: Abyssal Vexators are demons specialized in inflicting excruciating pain upon their victims. Their monstrous form is difficult to discern, as they are essentially just ethereal shadows shrouded in an aura of oppressive darkness. Abyssal Vexators wield an array of ethereal chains that writhe and lash like serpents, each link infused with a cursed enchantment designed to bind and torment their prey. In combat, an Abyssal Vexator unleashes a terrifying chain attack, ensnaring its victims with its spectral links, pulling them closer to experience the full brunt of its maleficent power. The chains wrap tightly around their bodies, inflicting an agonizing and unending torment that leaves the unfortunate souls broken and withered.
